      void Matrix4d.transform​(SGVec_3d input, SGVec_3d output)
      Transforms the vector by this matrix and stores the result in the vector mul(Matrix4d).
      SGVec_3d Quaternion.transform​(SGVec_3d v)
      Transforms the given vector using this quaternion
      Matrix4d Matrix4d.translate​(SGVec_3d translation)
      Postmultiplies this matrix by a translation matrix.
      Matrix3d Matrix3d.trn​(SGVec_3d vector)
      Adds a translational component to the matrix in the 3rd column.
      Matrix4d Matrix4d.trn​(SGVec_3d vector)
